title: Quiz - Week 3 Complete Review
description: Quiz de révision complète sur toutes les structures du présent simple

questions.question: Which sentence correctly combines all present simple structures?
options: Do you always works in the morning? No, I don't.
Do you always work in the morning? No, I don't.
Does you always work in the morning? No, I doesn't.
Are you always work in the morning? No, I'm not.
questions.explanation: Correct: 'Do you always work' (question + adverb + base verb) + 'No, I don't' (short answer).

questions.question: Fix this sentence: 'She doesn't never eat breakfast.'
options: Both B and C are correct
questions.explanation: Double negative error. Correct options: 'She never eats breakfast' OR 'She doesn't usually eat breakfast'.

questions.question: Complete the dialogue: 'Does he often travel?' '___'
questions.explanation: Short answers don't include the adverb: 'Yes, he does' (not 'Yes, he often does').

questions.question: Which describes the most frequent activity?
What's the best way to describe your routine to someone new?
options: Combine positive, negative, and frequency adverbs
questions.explanation: A complete routine description uses all structures: positive, negative, and various frequency adverbs for accuracy.
